description: ff. 342. 300 x 164; 200 x 87 mm. 29 lin. Rabīʻ I 1172. Anon. commentary on the Multaqá al-abḥur. According to Fihrist al-kutub al-ʻarabīyah (1887-1892/3), III, 137 and Fihris al-kutub al-mawjūdah bi-al-Maktabah al-Azharīyah, II, 281, the author is Muṣṭafá ibn ʻUmar ibn Muḥammad , who completed this commentary in Rabīʻ II. 1066/1656; Ḥājjī Khalīfah, Kashf al-ẓunūn, col. 1815 (anon.). Incip.: ... وبعد فهذه اوراق مکتوبة لحل مشکلات ملتقى
subject: Ḥalabī, Ibrāhīm ibn Muḥammad, -1549 or 1550—Multaqá al-abḥur.
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
